COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x158
STRING: [Chris] “So, Torta. Can I ask for your help today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, of course you can.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a0
STRING: Torta stood up immediately as she cleared away her
empty lunch box.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d2
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, I'll ask around, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e8
STRING: [Chris] “Right. But you have some leads, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a
STRING: [Torta] “I know that you have none, Chris. Just stick with
me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23a
STRING: [Chris] “Y-Yeah, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x272
STRING: [Torta] “First... Right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x288
STRING: She led me out of the cafeteria to the hallway lined with
practice rooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ae
STRING: The practice rooms along the hallway looked busy at
this hour.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c4
STRING: There were almost no practice rooms with open doors.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d0
STRING: It wasn't rare for all the practice rooms to be full at this
time on a Monday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e6
STRING: It seemed that everyone believed that famous saying by
some unknown music professor, “Neglect your
instrument for one day, lose three days of skill.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x306
STRING: Of course there was no school on weekends, but hardly
any students spent their two days off without practicing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31c
STRING: That's how serious everyone was about music, but
unfortunately, that had nothing to do with me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x332
STRING: So, serious students spend their Saturdays and Sundays
with no classes working away in the practice rooms
from the morning on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x348
STRING: It was common for the practice rooms to be full up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x354
STRING: Students like Torta and myself who could practice at
home were better off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x360
STRING: You couldn't sing at the top of your lungs, but it was
considered part of the city's character and generally
accepted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x376
STRING: And there were certain instruments that could be
muted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38c
STRING: But nothing could be done in that regard for the piano,
which featured the largest number of students, or for
string instruments.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a2
STRING: Which meant that students who couldn't practice at
home or at school would flock to the practice rooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b8
STRING: Even Torta spent her days off practicing, unlike me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ce
STRING: I was always in awe of the effort she put into practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e4
STRING: However, the fact that I can't follow her example...
Maybe it's a difference in personality.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x400
STRING: [Chris] “What are we doing here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x432
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm? Oh, I wanted to ask someone I know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x456
STRING: [Chris] “Ask them... How?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46c
STRING: Torta peeked into the small window of a practice room
as if she wasn't listening to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x49e
STRING: [Torta] “Oops, not someone I know. Next.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b4
STRING: [Chris] “Umm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e6
STRING: [Torta] “Umm, maybe here... Ah, here we are.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4fc
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52e
STRING: [Torta] “Wait a sec.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x56a
STRING: A male student came out after a bit, perhaps having
noticed the noise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x580
STRING: [Schoolboy] “Well-well, Tortinita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x59e
STRING: [Torta] “Hello. Umm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b4
STRING: She was being pretty forceful, but the student didn't
seem to mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ca
STRING: In fact, he looked a little happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d6
STRING: [Schoolboy] “Ah-ha-ha-ha. So, what did you want?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f4
STRING: [Torta] “About that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x61e
STRING: Torta turned to me with a smile and started to
introduce me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x62a
STRING: I knew I needed to introduce myself at that point.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x640
STRING: But I just couldn't get up the spirit and instead merely
nodded my head slightly to him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x672
STRING: [Torta] “Chris...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x688
STRING: [Schoolboy] “Uh... Umm.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x69e
STRING: [Chris] “Afternoon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d0
STRING: [Torta] “A-Anyway...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x726
STRING: [Torta] “I'm sorry this is so sudden.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x73c
STRING: [Schoolboy] “N-No, I should apologize.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x778
STRING: [Torta] “Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x78e
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a4
STRING: Of course this student would turn me down.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b0
STRING: I knew, though, that more than half of the responsibility
lay with my attitude.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c6
STRING: I just apologized before Torta said anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ee
STRING: [Torta] “Are you doing this on purpose?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x804
STRING: [Chris] “It's not... on purpose.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x81a
STRING: It wasn't difficult to imagine what he thought of me, not
even introducing myself properly and seeing the
disinterested look on my face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x830
STRING: Of course I knew that I was the one asking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x846
STRING: But I didn't feel like it was what I wanted. The fact was, I
didn't feel good about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x878
STRING: [Torta] “Man...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8aa
STRING: [Torta] “You are so unsociable. That's why you have no
friends, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ca
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, you're right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ee
STRING: Of course I didn't deny it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x91c
STRING: The ones I could actually call friends were Torta, Asino,
and...that was all I could think of.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x938
STRING: Including Torta, I could count my friends on one hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x954
STRING: I didn't think to be more friendly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x960
STRING: I wasn't dissatisfied with the situation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x988
STRING: [Torta] “We'll move on, but be more friendly next time,
okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x99e
STRING: [Chris] “No, wait a minute.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d0
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm? What's up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e6
STRING: [Chris] “Isn't there some other way to do this? We're
just asking out of the blue while they're practicing...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa22
STRING: [Torta] “But he was happy to talk to us. If you weren't
such a stick-in-the-mud, I think he would have just said
yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa4c
STRING: [Chris] “No... No way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa70
STRING: That may actually have been true.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7c
STRING: If more than half the fault was my attitude, I think the
rest could be attributed to the fact that I am not the
type that people like much.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa9c
STRING: It wasn't just him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaca
STRING: It was simply that the school was not accepting of
students like me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae0
STRING: Most of the students at the school were ambitious,
always thinking about being successful at music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf6
STRING: And that is the direction most of the teachers pushed
you toward.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb02
STRING: There were only two kinds of students that didn't fit that
mold.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb0e
STRING: Those that had fallen off the rails, and those who didn't
need to worry because of their exceptional abilities.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb24
STRING: The former were looked down on, while the latter were
envied.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb30
STRING: I thought I was the former, but I tended to be regarded
as the latter because of my ability to play the Fortelle,
and play it well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb46
STRING: And it would be okay if it was just about most students
being jealous.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb52
STRING: But within that jealousy was also a sense of awe.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb5e
STRING: I, however, wasn't trying to use that to my advantage.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb6a
STRING: I'd already been told by Ms. Cordell and Torta that
people thought I was difficult to get along with.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb80
STRING: In short, I had no interest in getting along with people.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb8c
STRING: But as unsuitable as I was for the school, I didn't think
that the school was unsuitable for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb2
STRING: I always chalked up my troubles to the school not being
very accepting of students like me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbea
STRING: [Torta] “Well... I suppose you could say it can't be
helped.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc00
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. It's as you say, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc16
STRING: Why was Torta so intent on carrying out this exercise in
futility, knowing me as well as she did?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc48
STRING: [Torta] “But let's look a little more. Having no prospects
just won't do. At least this way we have a slight chance
of finding someone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc68
STRING: So she already knew.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc74
STRING: This was just for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc80
STRING: [Chris] “Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb2
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, now wear a smile!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc8
STRING: [Chris] “That's not happening.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcfa
STRING: [Torta] “You have no motivation.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd10
STRING: [Chris] “Yes I do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd42
STRING: [Torta] “For now... Right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdac
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah... No good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc2
STRING: [Chris] “Good work.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf4
STRING: [Torta] “It's like you think it's someone else's job.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe0a
STRING: Torta sat up from laying across the cafeteria table, and
pulled a cup close to herself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe3a
STRING: [Torta] “Should be okay now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe50
STRING: [Chris] “Not yet. It's hot.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe6e
STRING: [Torta] “What? It's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeae
STRING: [Torta] “That's HOT!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec4
STRING: [Chris] “See...? I told you so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef6
STRING: [Torta] “Oooh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0c
STRING: [Chris] “You're making me uncomfortable just watching
you. It's not exactly cold here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf48
STRING: [Torta] “I like it, so leave me alone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5e
STRING: [Chris] “You know you're bad with hot food and drink.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf7c
STRING: [Torta] “What-ever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa2
STRING: The drink must have cooled down, as Torta brought it
to her mouth again happily.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc0
STRING: [Torta] “Ooh, that's good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd6
STRING: [Chris] “You've liked that forever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfec
STRING: Torta was happily drinking her drink of heated
chocolate.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1002
STRING: That's really all cioccolata calda was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1018
STRING: Maybe you couldn't even call it a drink.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1024
STRING: You did drink it, of course, but mostly the thick
chocolate was eaten with a spoon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x103a
STRING: It's sweet and very filling, so I could never drink all of it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1058
STRING: [Torta] “It's warm and sweet. It's the best.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106e
STRING: [Chris] “It may be winter, but I'm not cold at all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x108e
STRING: As I spoke the words, I was reminded of my hometown.
Just like when reading one of Arie's letters.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a4
STRING: The country was split in two by mountains; we were
born in the north, and now we were living in the south.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ba
STRING: The climate was very different; it was warm here, even
in the winter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d8
STRING: [Torta] “I like it, so leave me alone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ee
STRING: Mixing her chocolate with a spoon, Torta showed no
signs of losing her smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1104
STRING: [Chris] “Fine, but don't complain about it being hot
anymore, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1122
STRING: [Torta] “I didn't complain that much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1138
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah-yeah... Fine then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1156
STRING: [Torta] “Heh-heh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x116c
STRING: Well, it would be easier to get this talk over with while
she was happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1182
STRING: I spoke to Torta again, to talk about the day and to
apologize.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1198
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks for today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b6
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm? Sure, thanks for the chocolate.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11cc
STRING: Torta tilted her cup, obviously enjoying the last drop.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e2
STRING: [Chris] “Are you okay with just that? I mean it helps that
it's so cheap.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120a
STRING: [Torta] “I like it. We didn't end up finding anyone
anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1220
STRING: [Chris] “I thought this is how it would turn out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x123e
STRING: [Torta] “That's mean. So you're saying my idea was a
bad one?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1254
STRING: [Chris] “Not at all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x126a
STRING: The truth was I didn't think it was such a great idea.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1276
STRING: [Chris] “But I was wondering... Why did you ask only
male students?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1296
STRING: It was probably a little intrusive of me to worry about
Torta like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ac
STRING: But I couldn't help noticing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b8
STRING: I had thought it would be easier to ask mainly friends
for this kind of thing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ce
STRING: [Chris] “I mean, if it's just that you have a lot of guy
friends, that's okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ee
STRING: I said it nonchalantly, but if that were actually the case, I
would actually not be that okay with it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x130c
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1332
STRING: Torta put down the cup she had just finished drinking
from and faced me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1364
STRING: [Torta] “Why would you ask something like that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x137a
STRING: [Chris] “I... It was just a thought I had.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1390
STRING: One more thing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x139c
STRING: The last male student she asked didn't even know
Torta's name.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a8
STRING: I knew we needed a vocalist, just as Torta explained...
But at least one of the students she asked she'd never
met before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13da
STRING: [Torta] “Ah, could it be... jealousy?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13f0
STRING: [Chris] “Right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1422
STRING: [Torta] “Ah-ha-ha, you admit it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1438
STRING: [Chris] “Maybe about a third of it is as you say, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x146a
STRING: [Torta] “That's oddly specific. It's not half?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1480
STRING: [Chris] “I'm worried about your relationships as a friend,
and jealous as your childhood friend.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a8
STRING: [Torta] “That's two. What's the other one?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14be
STRING: [Chris] “You didn't know that last student, did you
Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e6
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, no. I thought I recognized him from a
lecture during my first year or something.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1506
STRING: [Chris] “Could it be... You don't have any girlfriends?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1538
STRING: [Torta] “What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x154e
STRING: At first, Torta didn't seem to understand what I meant
by that fairly rude question.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1564
STRING: But with time, she slowly came to understand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x158c
STRING: [Torta] “Of course I do! Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15a2
STRING: [Chris] “Well, you're not like me, so I'm sure that's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c0
STRING: [Torta] “Don't say that about yourself!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15d6
STRING: [Chris] “You were going to say it, weren't you Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f4
STRING: [Torta] “Still.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x160a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah-yeah. So? Was there some reason? They
just weren't in the practice rooms?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1646
STRING: [Torta] “Listen, I can't pair you up with a girl, okay Chris?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1666
STRING: [Chris] “Why not?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1684
STRING: [Torta] “The rumor.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16aa
STRING: [Chris] “The one we talked about over lunch? You don't
believe that, do you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16d6
STRING: [Chris] “The one we talked about before? You don't
believe that, do you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1712
STRING: [Torta] “No, I don't believe it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1728
STRING: [Chris] “So why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1746
STRING: [Torta] “Jealousy is about one-tenth of it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x175c
STRING: [Chris] “Ah-ha-ha, that's not very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178e
STRING: [Torta] “That's just as your childhood friend!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17a4
STRING: [Chris] “So? What about the rest?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17d6
STRING: [Torta] “There are things you don't believe, but are
afraid of, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ec
STRING: [Chris] “Not that I can think of...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x181e
STRING: [Torta] “Really? Umm... Do you believe in God, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1834
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? Where did that come from?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1866
STRING: [Torta] “Just answer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18e2
STRING: [Chris] “I suppose I believe.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1914
STRING: [Torta] “What!?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192a
STRING: [Chris] “Why are you so surprised? Belief is normal, and
I thought you went to church sometimes, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1970
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, well, that's true. I was thinking of a
slightly deeper meaning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1990
STRING: [Chris] “A deeper meaning?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19c2
STRING: [Torta] “Do you think there is a God that would
intervene in our lives?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19d8
STRING: [Chris] “No, I don't think that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a0a
STRING: [Torta] “Well, doesn't that sort of mean you don't
believe in God?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a2a
STRING: [Chris] “Not really. God definitely exists as a symbol of
faith.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a66
STRING: [Torta] “You're splitting hairs... That's not what I mean...
It's like, you know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a86
STRING: [Chris] “I don't know what you're saying.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ab8
STRING: [Torta] “So, do you believe that God will punish you for
doing something bad?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ad8
STRING: [Chris] “I said I don't believe that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1af6
STRING: [Torta] “Right? I think most people think like you, Chris.
But don't you think that they wouldn't do bad things like
vandalizing the church walls?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b20
STRING: [Chris] “Right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b52
STRING: [Torta] “It's the same thing. Even though you know he
isn't there, you're too scared to do it. So even though I
don't believe the rumor, I don't want you connected
with it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b90
STRING: It was a bit of a stretch for that to fill in the remaining
nine-tenths.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ba6
STRING: I thought about why she didn't want me connected with
the rumor, but I stopped myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bbc
STRING: [Chris] “I kind of understand, but that was a pretty
roundabout explanation.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bf8
STRING: [Torta] “That's because you gave an unexpected
answer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c0e
STRING: [Chris] “An unexpected answer. You mean about God?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c40
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c56
STRING: She lowered her voice slightly at that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c62
STRING: [Chris] “What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c7e
STRING: [Chris] “I don't think I believe in the true sense of the
word. But what's wrong with that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cba
STRING: [Torta] “Right. But don't you think that most wouldn't do
bad things like vandalizing the church walls?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cda
STRING: [Chris] “That's probably true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d0c
STRING: [Torta] “Even though I don't believe it, I don't want you
connected with the rumor.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d2c
STRING: It was a bit of a stretch for that to fill in the remaining
nine-tenths.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d42
STRING: I thought about why she didn't want me connected with
the rumor, but I stopped myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d58
STRING: [Chris] “Well, I suppose I understand.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d8a
STRING: [Torta] “I thought you would.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da0
STRING: [Chris] “Even so... God?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dd2
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, but, it's not like I don't believe at all, you
know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1df2
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I'm the same. That's why I pray at church.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e2e
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, but you said you don't believe in the true
sense, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e44
STRING: [Chris] “If religious guidance helps us become better
people, then you can't say that God doesn't exist and
intervene in people's lives.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e8a
STRING: [Torta] “What's that about? Did you read that in a book
or something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea0
STRING: [Chris] “No, I heard someone say it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ed2
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah... They would say that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1efc
STRING: Imagining our friend who said that, Torta whispered
with her eyes slightly lowered.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f1a
STRING: [Torta] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f30
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f54
STRING: [Torta] “If there was a God...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f6a
STRING: [Chris] “If there was...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f9c
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah... I was just thinking that all the bad
things in the world would just go away.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fbc
STRING: [Chris] “I didn't expect you to get so deep so suddenly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fee
STRING: [Torta] “Don't you think so, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2004
STRING: [Chris] “It's not that I disagree with the sentiment. I just
think it's very unlikely.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2036
STRING: [Torta] “I know. I was just thinking it would be nice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x204c
STRING: [Chris] “That's not like you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x207e
STRING: [Torta] “Like me?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ac
STRING: ...Yeah, I guess not.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20cc
STRING: Seeming to bounce back, Torta stood up and grabbed
her empty cup.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20fe
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, we should head home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2114
STRING: [Chris] “Right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2138
STRING: It was raining as always outside the window, and it was
dark.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2174
STRING: [Chris] “I'm home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x219a
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, welcome home. You're late. Did something
happen?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21b0
STRING: I heard Phorni's reply from inside the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21bc
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? Oh yeah, well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21d2
STRING: I tossed my bag into the room and wiped my hair with a
towel by the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21f0
STRING: [Phorni] “Is it still raining?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2206
STRING: [Chris] “The same as always.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2224
STRING: [Phorni] “Never gets old, it seems.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x223a
STRING: [Chris] “Sure doesn't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2250
STRING: We chatted, looking out the window.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x225c
STRING: Then I stuffed the towel into the laundry basket, and
finally entered the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x228e
STRING: [Phorni] “So? Why are you so late?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22a4
STRING: [Chris] “I was with Torta, looking for a partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22d6
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, so, did you find one?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22ec
STRING: [Chris] “All of them were a no-go. Our method of
searching wasn't so good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x230a
STRING: [Phorni] “Method of searching?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2320
STRING: [Chris] “Torta just burst into the practice rooms and said
please be this person's partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x235c
STRING: [Phorni] “What is that? Just bursting in.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2372
STRING: [Chris] “She'd knock on the sound-proof door and go in
after they noticed. Just what I said.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23ae
STRING: [Phorni] “Which means... it was Torta's idea.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23c4
STRING: [Chris] “That's right. So you get it, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23f6
STRING: [Phorni] “I get it. That's just like Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x240c
STRING: [Chris] “I suppose you could say that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2422
STRING: Torta was reliable, but she did have a few faults.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2438
STRING: Phorni had met Torta, though not many times.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x244e
STRING: I talked about Torta so much that Phorni's image of her
was locked in her head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x246c
STRING: [Phorni] “But she did it for you, Chris, so you should be
grateful.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x248c
STRING: [Chris] “I am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24a2
STRING: I didn't know who Torta was to Phorni, but it was
obvious that she liked her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24b8
STRING: She seemed to think the same of Arie, who I talked
about just as much.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x250e
STRING: [Phorni] “So? Did anything else happen?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2524
STRING: [Chris] “Umm... Ms. Cordell told me to hurry up and find
a partner, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2560
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah-ha-ha, that means almost everyone you
know told you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2580
STRING: [Chris] “Well, I don't know that many people.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25b2
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey... Is that an excuse?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25c8
STRING: [Chris] “Well, it is the truth, isn't it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25fa
STRING: [Phorni] “You're despicable. You shouldn't be proud of
not having many friends.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x261a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, you're right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x264c
STRING: [Phorni] “It's like... You're not aware of it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2662
STRING: [Chris] “I'm aware of it. I just don't really care.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x269e
STRING: [Phorni] “So you're despicably aware.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26b4
STRING: [Chris] “I'm satisfied with that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26e6
STRING: [Phorni] “＊sigh＊ That may be your problem.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26fc
STRING: Phorni made her usual bored face

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2718
STRING: and urged me to continue.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2738
STRING: Telling Phorni what happened during the day like this
was already a daily routine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x274e
STRING: She didn't want to go outside, but always wanted to
hear me talk about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2766
STRING: Fairies are mysterious creatures; even after living with
one for almost three years, I didn't fully understand
them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x277c
STRING: She could touch things, but didn't get wet in the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2788
STRING: She didn't eat anything, and could sing and sing without
getting tired.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x279e
STRING: She floated, but couldn't fly, and she could appear and
disappear at will.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27b4
STRING: Despite defying the laws of physics, she couldn't get up
high and was always bugging me for a hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27cc
STRING: But... Leaving a towel by the door after I left in the
morning became Phorni's job at some point.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27e2
STRING: In short, it was impossible to think about Phorni
logically. If you could accept her for what she was, it
was quite fun.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2802
STRING: In ancient times written about in history books, people
lost a part of their civilization called “magic.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2818
STRING: It was replaced by a field called “science” at some point,
which made a fair amount of progress over many long
years.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x282e
STRING: But there were still many things not understood in the
world.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2844
STRING: One of those things was a cheerful fairy, skilled at
singing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x285c
STRING: Thinking about the unknown boundaries of the world
was a boundless and ultimately futile exercise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2868
STRING: That's what I had come to think now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x287e
STRING: Then, I told Phorni about my day, as always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28d6
STRING: [Phorni] “Kind of a fruitless day, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28ec
STRING: Having listened to everything, Phorni didn't look bored;
in fact she looked happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2902
STRING: She said things like that, but she enjoyed hearing about
the outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2918
STRING: [Chris] “I guess so. Alright, I'll make dinner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2936
STRING: [Phorni] “What are you having today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x294c
STRING: [Chris] “Just whatever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2980
STRING: I ate whatever I could whip up myself, and the day
ended as always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29a6
STRING: And then, as always, I fell asleep while listening to the
rain.
